name: Asaas Gateway for WooCommerce
author: Asaas

sections.description:
Use Asaas as payment method in your WooCommerce store.

This plugin is an implementation of Asaas API v3. The checkout mechanism is completely transparent. The customer will not go out of your store to finish the order. The data are sent to Asaas service, that process the payment and return its status.

For any doubt about the plugin installation and integration, please read the FAQ. If it doesn’t solve, use the plugin Support area that we will help you as soon as possible.
sections.installation:
This gateway requires WooCommerce 2.6 and above.

From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit Plugins > Add New.
  2. Search for Asaas Gateway for WooCommerce.
  3. Click in Install Now and, after, in Activate.
  4. Visit WooCommerce > Settings > Checkout.
  5. Visit Asaas Ticket and Asaas Credit Card to enable, set up and integrate the gateway with Asaas system.

From WordPress.org

  1. Download Asaas Gateway for WooCommerce
  2. Unzip the file and upload the woo-asaas directory to your wp-content/plugins directory using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etcâ€¦). Or visit Plugins > Add New > Upload Plugin, select woo-asaas.zip file, click in Install Now and, after, in Activate Plugin.
  3. Search for Asaas Gateway for WooCommerce.
  4. Visit WooCommerce > Settings > Checkout.
  5. Visit Asaas Ticket and Asaas Credit Card to enable, set up and integrate the gateway with Asaas system.

short_description: Take transparent credit card and bank ticket payment checkouts on your store using Asaas.
description:
Use Asaas as payment method in your WooCommerce store.

This plugin is an implementation of Asaas API v3. The checkout mechanism is completely transparent. The customer will not go out of your store to finish the order. The data are sent to Asaas service, that process the payment and return its status.

For any doubt about the plugin installation and integration, please read the FAQ. If it doesn’t solve, use the plugin Support area that we will help you as soon as possible.
